Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: Mindy J Moeller
Reviews.Content: This tablet worked great for about 2 weeks.  Then, the charging dock wouldn't work.  The tablet will now not recharge.  Unfortunately, many other reviews I have seen elsewhere are reporting the same problems.

Reviews.Title: Always care your tablets as tools not as toys.
Reviews.Author: Edgard Gnanhoui "EDMASTER"
Reviews.Content: Most tablet users think that they could download any crazy apps no limit...or transferring  very often device to devices...I always use my own tablets even ipad as eggs. Because there sensible to shocks or troubleshooting...
